text: The discography for American alternative metal band Creed consists of 4 studio albums. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 1997 My Own Prison * Release date: April 14, 1997 * Label: Blue Collar Records 1999 Human Clay * Release date: September 28, 1999 * Label: Wind-up Records 2001 Weathered * Release date: November 20, 2001 * Label: Wind-up Records 2009 Full Circle * Release date: October 27, 2009 * Label: Wind-up Records ==References== Category:Discographies
title: Creed discography
